long_description: The rugged Thule Pulse roof box is an ideal choice for hauling gear to your next adventure. Large capacity carries luggage, snowboards (3 - 4), and paddles with ease, and frees up all kinds of trunk space no matter what you're heading out to do. Rugged construction with impact-resistant ABS plastic. Passenger-side opening provides easy access for loading and unloading. Can be mounted on square and round crossbars and most factory racks (see Fit List). Easy-grip mounting assembles quickly and easily attaches to car rack. Thule Pulse roof box has a SecureLock feature that ensures cargo box is closed securely.
short_description: The rugged Thule Pulse roof box is an ideal choice for hauling gear to your next adventure.
